properties.script:
out0 = spark.sql(f"""
    SELECT
  '{Config.sourceSystem}'  SRC_SYS_CD,
stpo.stlty as BOM_CAT_CD,
stpo.stlnr as BOM_NUM,
stpo.stlkn as BOM_ITM_NODE_NUM,
stpo.stpoz as BOM_ITM_CNTR_NBR,
case when stpo.datuv = '00000000' then null else to_timestamp(stpo.datuv,\"yyyyMMdd\") end AS BOM_ITM_VLD_FROM_DTTM,
trim(stpo.aennr) as CHG_NUM,
trim(stpo.lkenz) as DEL_IND,
trim(stpo.vgknt) as PREV_NODE_NUM,
trim(stpo.vgpzl) as PREV_ITM_CNTR_NBR,
case when stpo.andat = '00000000' then null else to_timestamp(stpo.andat,\"yyyyMMdd\") end AS CRT_DTTM,
case when stpo.aedat = '00000000' then null else to_timestamp(stpo.aedat,\"yyyyMMdd\") end AS CHG_DTTM,
trim(stpo.idnrk) as CMPNT_NUM,
trim(stpo.postp) as BOM_ITM_CAT_CD,
trim(stpo.posnr) as BOM_ITM_NUM,
trim(stpo.meins) as CMPNT_UOM_CD,
cast(trim(stpo.menge) as decimal(18,4)) as CMPNT_QTY,
trim(stpo.fmeng) as FX_QTY_IND,
cast(trim(stpo.ausch) as decimal(18,4)) as CMPNT_SCRAP_QTY_PCT,
cast(trim(stpo.avoau) as decimal(18,4)) as OPR_SCRAP_QTY_PCT,
trim(stpo.schgt) as BOM_ITM_BULK_IND,
cast(trim(stpo.nlfzt) as decimal(18,4)) as LEAD_TIME_OFFST_DAYS_QTY,
trim(stpo.verti) as DSTN_KEY_CD,
trim(stpo.alpos) as ALT_ITM_IND,
cast(trim(stpo.ewahr) as decimal(18,4)) as ALT_ITM_QTY_PCT,
concat(stpo.potx1,\";\",stpo.potx2) as BOM_ITM_TXT,
cast(trim(stpo.webaz) as decimal(18,4)) as GR_DAYS_LEAD_QTY,
trim(stpo.kzkup) as CO_PROD_IND,
trim(stpo.alpst) as ALT_ITM_STRTGY_CD,
trim(stpo.alprf) as ALT_ITM_RNKNG_NBR,
trim(stpo.alpgr) as ALT_ITM_GRP_CD,
NULL AS  BOM_ITM_VLD_TO_DTTM,
trim(stpo.pswrk)  as ISU_PLNT,
trim(stpo.techv)  as TECH_STS_FROM,
trim(stpo.annam)  as USER_WHO_CRT_REC,
trim(stpo.aenam)  as NM_OF_PRSN_WHO_CHG_OBJ,
trim(stpo.sortf)  as SRT_STRNG,
trim(stpo.netau)  as NET_SCRAP_IN,
trim(stpo.beikz)  as MATL_PRVSN_IN,
trim(stpo.erskz)  as SPARE_PART_IN,
trim(stpo.rvrel)  as ITM_RLVNT_TO_SLS_IN,
trim(stpo.sanfe)  as ITM_RLVNT_TO_PRDTN_IN,
trim(stpo.sanin)  as ITM_RLVNT_TO_PLNT_MAINT_IN,
trim(stpo.sanka)  as FOR_RLVNC_TO_COST_IN,
trim(stpo.sanko)  as ITM_RLVNT_TO_ENGR_IN,
trim(stpo.sanvs)  as HIGH_LVL_CNFG_IN,
trim(stpo.stkkz)  as PM_ASBL_IN,
trim(stpo.rekri)  as BOM_IS_RCURSV_IN,
trim(stpo.rekrs)  as RCURSV_ALLW_IN,
trim(stpo.cadpo)  as CAD_IN,
trim(stpo.nfmat)  as FLLP_MATL_BOM_ITM,
trim(stpo.ekgrp)  as PRCHSNG_GRP,
cast(trim(stpo.lifzt) as decimal(18,4)) as DELV_TIME_IN_DAYS,
trim(stpo.lifnr)  as ACCT_NUM_OF_SUP,
cast(trim(stpo.preis) as decimal(18,4))  as PRICE,
cast(trim(stpo.peinh) as decimal(18,4))  as PRC_UNIT,
trim(stpo.waers)  as CRNCY_KEY,
trim(stpo.sakto)  as COST_ELMNT,
cast(trim(stpo.roanz) as decimal(18,4)) as REQ_NUM_OF_VAR_SIZE_ITM,
cast(trim(stpo.roms1) as decimal(18,4)) as SIZE_1,
cast(trim(stpo.roms2) as decimal(18,4)) as SIZE_2,
cast(trim(stpo.roms3) as decimal(18,4)) as SIZE_3,
trim(stpo.romei)  as UNIT_OF_MEAS_FOR_SZ_1_TO_3,
cast(trim(stpo.romen) as decimal(18,4)) as VAR_SZ_ITM_QTY_PER_PIECE,
trim(stpo.rform)  as FRML_KEY_FOR_VAR_SZ_ITM,
trim(stpo.upskz)  as SUB_ITM_EXIST_IN,
trim(stpo.valkz)  as ITM_IN_MORE_THN_ONE_ALT,
trim(stpo.ltxsp)  as LONG_TEXT_LANG,
trim(stpo.objty)  as OBJ_TYPE,
trim(stpo.matkl)  as MATL_GRP,
trim(stpo.dokar)  as DOC_TYPE,
trim(stpo.doknr)  as DOC_NUM,
trim(stpo.dokvr)  as DOC_VERS,
trim(stpo.doktl)  as DOC_PART,
cast(trim(stpo.csstr) as decimal(18,4))  as AVG_MATL_PURITY_IN_PERCNT,
trim(stpo.class)  as CLS_NUM,
trim(stpo.klart)  as CLS_TYPE,
trim(stpo.potpr)  as RSLTNG_ITM_CAT,
trim(stpo.awakz)  as SLCT_IN_FOR_CNFG_BOM,
trim(stpo.inskz)  as INST_IN,
trim(stpo.vcekz)  as NOT_DSPL_IN_CNFG_EDITR_IN,
trim(stpo.vstkz)  as NOT_DSPL_IN_SNGL_LVL_CNFG,
trim(stpo.vackz)  as NOT_DSPL_IN_AUTO_CNFG_IN,
trim(stpo.ekorg)  as PRCHSNG_ORG,
trim(stpo.clobk)  as REQ_CMPNT,
trim(stpo.clmul)  as MLT_SLCT_ALLW,
trim(stpo.clalt)  as ALT_DSPLY_FMT,
trim(stpo.cview)  as ORG_AREA,
trim(stpo.knobj)  as NUM_OF_OBJ_WTH_ASGN_DPND,
trim(stpo.lgort)  as ISS_LOC_FOR_PRDTN_ORDR,
trim(stpo.intrm)  as INTRA_MATL,
trim(stpo.tpekz)  as RSTRC_EXIST_IN,
trim(stpo.stvkn)  as INHRT_NODE_NUM_OF_BOM_ITM,
case when stpo.dvdat = '00000000' then null else to_timestamp(stpo.dvdat,\"yyyyMMdd\") end AS LAST_DT_SHFT_DTTM,
trim(stpo.dvnam)  as NM_OF_THE_USER,
trim(stpo.dspst)  as EXPLS_TYPE,
trim(stpo.kznfp)  as FLLP_ITM_IN,
trim(stpo.nfgrp)  as FLLP_GRP,
trim(stpo.nfeag)  as DSCNT_GRP,
trim(stpo.kndvb)  as MAN_CHG_TO_SLS_ORDR_BOM_IN,
trim(stpo.kndbz)  as BOM_ITM_CHG_DPND_IN,
trim(stpo.kstty)  as BOM_CAT_OF_ORIG_SLS_ORDR,
trim(stpo.kstnr)  as BOM_FOR_ORIG_SLS_ORDR,
trim(stpo.kstkn)  as NODE_NUM_OF_ORIG_SLS_ORDR,
trim(stpo.kstpz)  as CNTR_FOR_ORIG_SLS_ORDR,
trim(stpo.clszu)  as CLSN_NUM,
trim(stpo.kzclb)  as CLSN_AS_SLCT_COND_IN,
trim(stpo.aehlp)  as DT_SHFT_HIER_IN,
trim(stpo.prvbe)  as PRDTN_SUPL_AREA,
cast(trim(stpo.nlfzv) as decimal(18,4)) as LDTM_OFFST_FOR_OPR,
trim(stpo.nlfmv)  as UNIT_FOR_LDTM_OFFST_FOR_OPR,
trim(stpo.idpos)  as ITM_GRP,
trim(stpo.idhis)  as HIST_CNTR,
trim(stpo.idvar)  as CMPNT_VRNT,
trim(stpo.alekz)  as ALE_IN,
trim(stpo.itmid)  as EXTRNL_ID_OF_AN_ITM,
trim(stpo.guid )  as TEMP_NOT_USED,
trim(stpo.itsob)  as SPL_PRCMT_TYPE_FOR_BOM_ITM,
trim(stpo.rfpnt)  as REF_PT_FOR_BOM_TFR,
trim(stpo.guidx)  as GLOBL_ID_OF_AN_ITM_CHG_STS,
NULL as SEG_MANTN_FOR_BOM_CMPNT,
NULL as SEG_VAL,
NULL AS  VALID_TO_DTTM,
NULL AS CHG_NUM_TO,
NULL AS CHG_NUM_TO_1,
NULL as INHRT_NODE_NUM_OF_BOM_ITM_1,
NULL as UTC_TIME_STMP_LONG_DTTM,
trim(stpo.cufactor) as NUM_OF_CU_INSTNCE,
NULL AS DEVT_VAL_MANTN_FOR_CMPNT,
NULL AS QTY_DSTN_PRFL,
NULL AS REF_TO_QTY_DSTN_PRFL,
NULL AS CRIT_CMPNT_IN,
NULL AS CRIT_LVL_OF_A_CMPNT_IN_BOM,
trim(stpo.funcid) as FUNC_ID,
trim(stpo._sopromet_sernr) AS SER_NUM,
NULL AS BTCH_NUM
from {Config.sourceDatabase}.STPO STPO
WHERE STPO._deleted_ = 'F' AND STPO.MANDT=\"020\"  
 
""")
